protocols.title: Protocol selection
protocols.description: Select the wireless weather sensor protocols that Homey needs to receive. It is advised for best performance of Homey to only select the protocols that are really needed.

sensors.description: Below the sensors are listed that have been found by Homey until now. Once a sensor is in the list, it can be added to Homey under 'Devices' ('+') 'Wireless Weather Sensors' if desired.
